reviews.text: This hotel was the perfect solution for being close to the UN Center (VIC) but also close to the subway line for sightseeing. Staff was excellent and the airport bus comes right in front of the hotel. The sports center and Donau center for water and other related activities was convenient as well. The only downside was that there aren't many restaurants in the area open on the weekends.
reviews.title: Perfect hotel for being close to the UN center

likes.liked: — Convenience to the UN Center and the subway, staff spoke English.
likes.disliked: — Too far away from the main tourist attractions to be able to pop out for a coffee or light snack.

reviews.title: Very convenient location to Austria Centre
reviews.text: We stayed here in June during a conference. Despite of being very hot we liked our 10 min walk to the Austria centre few times a day. Rooms are very comfortablem, in fact airconditioning worked very well and when you close your windows you do not hear the noise of the street and subway.

reviews.title: Blend Business & Pleasure at Crowne Plaza, Vienna
reviews.text: Despite of being in the middle of concrete jungle we had a very nice view of green field in the distance.

reviews.title: Pleasant, comfortable and practical
reviews.text: Lots of shopping for food around, but not much else in terms of shopping. Parking is very expensive (22 euros a day), but staff was usefull in directing us where to park on the street - after paying about 12 euros we found (luckily) free parking just behind our hotel, and forgot to close the window with no ill effects.

reviews.title: Professional service and "not too bad" location
reviews.text: We have chosen this hotel for price/ air-conditioning/location reasons (A/C very important for a good night sleep!). It is around 15 to 20 minutes to town by the underground (subway U-Bahn)

The hotel situated between Kaisermuhlen-VIC (the UN station) and Alte Donau both about 4 to5 minutes walking distance (It is okay even walking with luggage).. It is a direct line to Stephenplaz and Karl Plaz (a big plus for us) . The evening party scene of Donuainsal is only one stop away from Kaisermuhlen-VIC.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel to stay in

reviews.text: We took the airbus which ran on a once hourly basis. It stopped in front of the Hotel. By 8:30am we were already at the hotel! The reception staff very politely told us that we can have our room but there is an additional charge for it. We opted for the alternative left our luggage in the hotel and come back around noon. (our official checking time is at 2:00pm but the reception say it is okay to come back at noon to check in our room)
reviews.title: OK but unexceptional

reviews.text: The room is tidy, clean and good in size
reviews.title: Location good for Austria Center and UNO

likes.liked: — The business location and each room has an iron!
likes.disliked: — The location when not in meetings

reviews.title: I will not stay anymore at this hotel
reviews.text: Breakfast -very good variety. The breakfast staffs were very efficient and friendly. Coffee served promptly.
